item.title: Briana White Talks Bringing Aerith to Life, the Strength She Brings to the Party & Best Supporting Role Nomination
item.content:encoded:
https://techraptor.net/gaming/interviews/briana-white-talks-bringing-aerith-to-life-strength-she-brings-to-party-and-best

After her nomination for Best Supporting Actor at the 2024 Golden Joystick Awards we had a chance to talk to Briana White, who brings Aerith to life in the remakes of Final Fantasy VII and Crisis Core. In our discussion, we talked about bringing such a beloved character to life, how her approach to voicing Aerith has changed over the years alongside the character's development, and how her life has changed meeting fans from all across the world and being nominated for various awards.

Since talking to White, she was also nominated for Best Performance for the 2024 Game Awards, continuing her streak of recognition for her performances.

As well as discussing her experiences with Aerith, we also had a chance to talk about her gaming-focused Twitch account and YouTube channel, Strange Rebel Gaming, and what led to its initial creation.

You can watch The Golden Joystick Awards live on Thursday November 21 at 4pm GMT / 11am EST.

Andrew has written Video Game and Entertainment news, reviews, and guides for 10+ years. As Senior Content Manager, he assists in creating and editingâ€¦ More about Andrew
